generator: node(X) :- edge(X,_). node(X) :- edge(_,X). adj(X,Y) :- edge(X,Y). adj(Y,X) :- edge(X,Y). { in_clique(X) : node(X) }.

hard_constraints.description: sanity check: if we pick two nodes for our clique, they better have an edge between them or it is not a clique.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- in_clique(X), in_clique(Y), X < Y, not adj(X,Y).

soft_constraints.description: every node we leave out of the clique is a bummer, so let's track those misses.
